title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models from any Python script.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same capabilities as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that exposes Ollama models as standard LangChain LLMs and embedders.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface) with multi-model chats, code highlighting, and admin panel.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Unofficial interactive CLI wrapper with conversation history, markdown rendering, and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot’s sidebar for inline suggestions and chat.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama built on OkHttp with Kotlin coroutines support and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; simple DSL for chat, generate, and embeddings.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models using slash commands.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for reproducible LLM-based tests.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook with recipes for function-calling, RAG, fine-tuning, and deploying Ollama on edge devices.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake providing reproducible builds of Ollama and curated model packages for NixOS.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a local AI assistant pane powered by Ollama for summarizing notes and brainstorming.

title: ollama-compose
summary: Docker Compose templates for spinning up Ollama alongside Grafana, Prometheus, and OpenWebUI stacks.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community-maintained Rust crate with async/tokio support for chatting and pulling models from Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash commands for private or channel-based chats with local models.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama with idiomatic interfaces and context cancellation.
